comments.raw_text:
With patches for bug 668349 and 668351, xpcshell tests can be run on an Android device, and the majority of tests pass. 

However, all 3 xpcshell tests in security/manager/ssl/tests/unit hang consistently if run on Android.
comments.author: gbrown@mozilla.com
comments.text:
With patches for bug 668349 and 668351, xpcshell tests can be run on an Android device, and the majority of tests pass. 

However, all 3 xpcshell tests in security/manager/ssl/tests/unit hang consistently if run on Android.
comments.creator: gbrown@mozilla.com
brian@briansmith.org
comments.author: brian@briansmith.org
comments.text: Note that attachment 553857 in bug 668349 disabled these tests, which means we don't have any testing on Android regarding packaged app signing.
comments.raw_text: Note that attachment 553857 in bug 668349 disabled these tests, which means we don't have any testing on Android regarding packaged app signing.
